intro: Torenia pterocalyx, commonly known as the Hawaiian torenia, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. The plant typically grows as a herbaceous annual or perennial, often found in moist, shaded environments. Its leaves are opposite and ovate, with a soft, hairy texture. Torenia pterocalyx plays an important role in the local ecosystem, providing nectar for native pollinators.
